title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.22 - Laundry dryers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.22 - Laundry dryers

State Regulations
A machine for drying laundry shall have its loading port
fitted with a door so arranged that opening the same more than four inches at
any point disconnects the power to moving parts which are exposed when the door
is fully open. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
